reviewText:
I only got there for them to tell me NO ROOMS.
After endless efforts for them to even get me an invoice for payment.
The staff seem helpless and not on top of their game. Totally confused. They asked us to wait till 12pm to see if some occupants will leave the rooms. That was surprising because they couldn't even confirm that on their system. We waited and waited as no one was telling us anything. Well, we had to quickly look for another hotel who accepted us well. Obviously Eusbett hotel is overwhelmed by the patronage it receives. Their website is poor as you can't even book from there. There will not respond to the emails. My calls were picked but three different attendants could not even do a simple booking for me, only to fly from Accra to Sunyani and you say no room. To think that they even picked us from the airport.
They can do better in order to be considered a top hotel.
reviewResponses:
Hello Guest,
We are very sorry for your experience as you have expressed. We are very sorry you could not make a reservation before getting to the hotel in spite of the several reservation channels we have which all our guests use and get their reservations done. We shall conduct an extensive investigation into why you could not make a reservation leading to your arrival to the hotel to realise the hotel is fully booked. 
As you confirmed, the hotel was fully booked at the time and these guests use our wide array of channels to make bookings. The high patronage is a true testament to our superior service delivery that gets guests coming back. It would be an honour for us to have you back with us today as make a space for you today, please. Please do ask to see the GM directly when you get to the hotel. We would also contact you immediately if you can share your phone number for us. 
Thank you very much and once again, our sincerest apologies to you.

reviewTitle: Eusbett is now a night club and not a 4 star hotel anymore
reviewText: I have previously stayed at the hotel in the new section with no issues, I have now returned and was sectioned in room 1103, You cannot sleep as the music is too loud, I also ordered room service and did not receive it. This is now a night club and not a hotel to get relaxation anymore.

Comfortable stay. However,  I will recommend you put a caution statement at the washroom indicating that the first drops of shower within the first 1 minute is very hot so it's advisable to stay away. I nearly got scalded on my first day. That notwithstanding,  it was an enjoyable stay.

The food I had was Jollof, I‚Äôve tasted their food and really enjoyed years back but the subsequent ones I had is nothing to write home. Today I bought Jollof (take home) really tasted awful, couldn‚Äôt eat half of it. Don‚Äôt know it their previous chef has been changed cos looks like anytime I go the food keeps getting worse. As for the staff they keep conversing, I had to walk to them to place my order but they still had to finish with their convo b4 responding to me smh
reviewResponses:
Hello Guest,
We appreciate that you have patronized and enjoyed the taste of our food for years. We also acknowledge your feedback on the changes you have observed recently. We shall investigate your experience and put in the needed actions to ensure you enjoy the taste and service you have enjoyed in the times past. 
Thank you

reviewText: The pillow is wonderful. Even if you don‚Äôt bring any toiletries, don‚Äôt be perturbed because they have got you covered. The food is good, the breakfast is the greatest. I really loved my stay here and so everytime I come to Sunyani, I‚Äôd definitely come here‚ù§Ô∏è
reviewResponses:
Hello Genevieve,
Thank you so much for sharing your experience of us with the world. We take gladness in your rating with 5 stars bubble. We‚Äôre excited to hear you loved our food, especially our breakfast. This is why we stand for - an experience that lingers on. We look forward to welcoming you heee again with another great service to you

reviewTitle: My general impression of the facility and service rendered to me
reviewText: The room is well kept and very comfortable. I am really happy to enjoy such wonderful and top notch service from the staff and the facilities. I will want to come over again and will highly recommend to family and friends whenever they find themselves in Suyani

The best experience I have ever had in a while, Eusbett is one of the greatest hotels you can visit in the Bono region. The food is very delicious and staff's are also friendly which made me feel at home in Eusbett hotel. Try visiting Eusbett and your year will be complete üíØ.

My washroom didn‚Äôt have soap rack and the washroom drainage is slow. But the rooms are comfortable. I absolutely loved their food and personnel service. 
Their breakfast options were absolutely fantastic. Great hospitality and cozy rooms. Their pool is amazing too.

The staff of the facility are very professional and the environment neat.  However the water heater in my room wasn't the best. The initial temperature is very high and not safe. I will recommend the facility to friends and family who visit the region.

I have been using Eusbett Hotel since 2015 and have always been happy to do so. However, since October 2023 the thought of staying at Eusbett traumatises me. I found a huge black plastic in the soup when having dinner. I stopped eating and reported and showed the plastic to the Hotel management. No empathy or remorse shown. One of them even laughed. I beg for an apology, it did not come. I followed up after I left, with no response. A great disappointment.

Their poolside view is very nice. They also have clean and serene environment. Conference halls are excellent as well. Amazingly, they have 188 rooms in total. However, they always have unfailing water supply and WiFi connection is superb.

The room and breakfast was very good.
The reception made the check in so fast. We actually wanted to surprise a friend with birthday decorations and they helped us to exactly that.

I was very delighted with the service.

I recommend everyone to have this experience too

reviewTitle: The best of B/A, home away from home , best experience ever and i encouraged you all to try this nice facility
reviewText: Eusbett is one the best places one can talk about when it comes to B/A, this is my second time coming here but I absolutely loved it. The atmosphere is just home away from home and I wish to always vist most offen, to talk of the food   is the best meals I can talk of aside üòã my wife's food. Thank you eusbett, thank you eusbett staff's.

I only stayed here for one night, but I can say the food and live music was absolutely phenomenal! The best light soup I‚Äôve had in Ghana so far, and the staff were very helpful and accommodating. I wish I could have spent more time here and enjoyed the lounge and pool table as well!!
reviewResponses: Thanks so much for sharing your Eusbett Experience.  We‚Äôre excited you enjoyed our live music, professionalism of our staff and our meals. Particularly, we are excited to hear our light soup is the best you have had in Ghana. We go all lengths to create an exciting service experience for our guests. We look forward to your coming back and to spend more time exploring our other services.

reviewText: We had a great experience at Eusbett Hotel. The staff were prepared for Heritage Caravanites and were helpful. The dinner buffet was exceptional and plenty varieties. Our room was meant for two but seemed to be prepared for one which we managed. It was a nice time there.
reviewResponses:
Hello Happy Guest,
You just made our day with your sharing of your experience with the world. We always set out to exceed the expectations of our clients and we‚Äôre glad we achieved that with you and your fellow Caravanites. Let‚Äôs do this again

reviewText: Not allowed guest to bring in water is a problem for me because it's not force to drink your water

I would definitely recommend Eusbert Hotel to anyone planning a trip to Sunyani. From the moment I arrived until check-out, my experience was smooth, relaxing, and enjoyable. The staff were warm, professional, and always ready to assist with a smile, which made me feel right at home.

The rooms were clean, spacious, and well-furnished, with all the amenities I needed for a comfortable stay. I particularly appreciated the calm environment‚Äîit offered the perfect balance of comfort and quiet, whether I was working or just unwinding.

The hotel‚Äôs restaurant exceeded my expectations. The food was delicious, with a great mix of local and continental dishes. The drinks menu was also impressive, and I loved the cozy, welcoming atmosphere of the dining area.

The d√©cor and overall branding of the hotel added a unique charm, especially the artwork and cultural touches, like the stunning 3D ‚ÄòLast Supper‚Äô painting in the restaurant area. Everything felt intentional and well thought out.

Eusbert Hotel is also well-located‚Äîclose enough to access the city‚Äôs major spots, yet tucked away just enough to offer peace and quiet. I felt very safe throughout my stay, and it was easy to walk or drive to nearby attractions and shops.

In short, my stay at Eusbert Hotel was a great experience. Whether you're visiting Sunyani for business or leisure, this is a place that delivers quality, comfort, and genuine hospitality. I‚Äôd gladly return‚Äîand recommend it to others without hesitation.

Eusbett Hotel provides very clean rooms with clean bed linen and towels. Customer service is great, food is good, though pricey, and general ambience is great.
It is my preferred choice whenever I'm in Kumasi.
Serene environment, still more room for improvement
Poor customer service on several occasions. Poor food quality.

I stayed and dined here for less than 24 hours. No hot water for showers, fake reception phones in the room that dont connect at all to anything, DSTV is inconsistent, flat drinks at the bar. Nothing on the restaurant menu is prepared as the menu says. The staff are incredibly rude and clearly arent paid enough to even consider trying to help you. Good luck! Your trip will be ruined by this place. Photo of ‚Äúgrilled snapper‚Äù that I ordered from the menu.
reviewResponses:
We have observed your very inaccurate comments and we feel very disappointed on such a dishonest post. We feel your comments are very inaccurate and does not reflect us. We never had any complaint like this from you or any guest whilst you were here, if indeed you were here
. We are open to meet you to discuss and prove our point of service excellence to you. And we would be excited to have you try to prove your assertions. We wish you all the best. But kindly avoid such dishonest and inaccurate comments.

reviewText: Our stay wasn't good, the front office staff was rude and unpleasant. The person helping us choose our room was a nice gentleman though. They had us change multiple rooms in multiple buildings because they ran out in the main building. After finding us a room, at breakfast they said our room didn't come with breakfast because the room wasn't worth what i paid for. Also i wasn't refunded. All in all they need to do way better. I will not be staying here again anytime in the near future.
reviewResponses: We are really sorry for the inconvenience caused to you, please we will work on the whatever you have outline here and we wish to put things right and you will enjoy your next stay. Really sorry for the inconvenience caused.and thank you for your feedback.
